text: My Dear Melancholy, is an extended play released by Canadian singer-songwriter The Weeknd. It was released on March 30, 2018, through his label, XO, along with Republic Records. The EP contains six songs. It has so far topped the iTunes Album chart in over 40 countries. == Track listing == == References == Category:R&B; albums Category:2018 albums Category:The Weeknd
title: My Dear Melancholy,
